DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM - Gr√°fico Contas X Subfase
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT A.NOME, SUM(A.QTD) QTD FROM (
SELECT I.NOME, J.QTD FROM
(SELECT SUBFASE, COUNT(SUBFASE) QTD FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS GROUP BY SUBFASE) J
JOIN K_CRM_SUBFASES I ON I.HANDLE = J.SUBFASE
GROUP BY I.NOME, J.QTD)
A
GROUP BY A.NOME" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <Field Alias="QTD" From="A" Path="QTD" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
